Gangon came out slowly, holding his gun and quivering. But then he
straightened up and walked up to BrightBlade, he had lost bis nerve, because
of his affection to BrightBlade, actually, because before he had nothing to
live for, and now he has everything in BrightBlade. Gangon stood awaiting
orders...
